meta.title: Return Policy | Blckorack
meta.description: Learn about the return and exchange policy for Blckorack. We're committed to ensuring you're satisfied with your premium streetwear.
meta.keywords: return policy, exchange, refund, Blckorack, streetwear returns

policy.introduction: At Blckorack, we value your trust and strive to provide you with the best shopping experience. If for any reason you are not fully satisfied with your purchase, you can return the product under the following terms and conditions:

sections.title: Return Booking
sections.content: Returns must be booked within 24 hours of delivery. To initiate a return, please DM us on Instagram at @blckorack.in.

sections.title: Return Pickup
sections.content: Once your return is booked, a delivery partner will pick up the order within 48 hours from your address.

sections.title: Return Charges
sections.content: A return charge of ₹150 will be applicable. This charge will be deducted from your refund amount.

sections.title: Quality Check & Processing
sections.content: Once the returned product reaches our warehouse, it will undergo a Quality Check (QC) process. After successful QC approval, your refund will be processed.

sections.title: Refunds
sections.content: Once we receive and inspect your returned item, we will notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund. If approved, your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your original method of payment within 7-10 business days.

sections.title: Timelines
sections.content: The complete return and refund process usually takes 6–7 working days from the date of pickup.

sections.title: Important Note
sections.content: Products must be returned in their original condition with tags and packaging intact. Returns that fail QC will not be eligible for a refund.
